name: Prison Dash
description:
Prison Dash


Gain your high score by simply keep running!

Prison Dash has that classic retro look and feel. It's about as stripped down as an endless runner can be. There are no power-ups, or missions. It's all about the running and jumping.

Addictive, Simple, Fun

- Simple and classic retro look and feel!
- Unique and challenging obstacles
- Controls are so simple: Tap right to jump, tap left to change color, that's all!
